text: The December 2008 ice storm was a bad ice storm in New England and New York. It made millions of people lose power. The storm was said to be the worst ice storm in a decade for New England. It was also the worst in 21 years for New York. Because of the storm, many trees fell down. They were coated in a heavy layer of ice. Many people were still without power after the storm was gone. == References == Category:2008 in weather Category:Natural disasters in the United States Category:2008 in New York (state)
title: December 2008 New England ice storm
